ygData.subject: Re: Flight spell
ygData.msgSnippet: This spell is actually Levitate. In the research book it is called flight but it is levitate. Although I have heard it is different from the levitate scroll in
ygData.messageBody:
This spell is actually Levitate. In the research book it is called flight
but it is levitate. Although I have heard it is different from the levitate
scroll in that it is wizard only.

~~Farwen "Mightyraven" Ohtarin~~

VorRata wrote:

> From: "VorRata" <VorRata@...>
>
> Might this really be Levitate? What web sight did you see it on?
>
> Are the runes the Rune of Expulsion and the Rune of Attraction? If so, then
> it's levitate. If not.. COOL! What are the runes???? LOL
>
> -Vor
>
